name: Pedranda
description:
Play as a red panda! Eat bamboo in a Cornish zoo and earn panda coins as you make friends with the visitors.

This game is a 3D 3rd person abstract simulation game for children where you live as a red panda in a Cornish zoo. Keep your energy up by eating bamboo and earn the highest score by posing for visitors.

Our cause is to raise awareness for zoo's in financial crisis. 

Creators

Ben Andrews - 3D artist and All-rounder

Hollie Bown - UI and Concept artist
